wellness.title: South Africa’s cannabis market: preventing misuse or missed opportunities
wellness.content: Macroeconomic trends, such as developments in legislation and regulations, are the primary drivers and constraints for the South African cannabis market’s current and medium-to-long-term performance.

wellness.title: Discovering a ‘magic’ mushroom was no trick
wellness.content: Researcher Alexander Bradshaw and team uncover a new fungi species.

wellness.title: Two new species of Psilocybe mushrooms discovered in southern Africa
wellness.content: Researchers describe Psilocybe ingeli and Psilocybe maluti, including traditional use by Basotho healers — the only first-hand report of hallucinogenic mushrooms being used traditionally in Africa.

education.title: 🧠 Understanding Microdosing – Beginners Guide

cultivation.title: 🧪 Harvesting & Curing Cannabis Plants
cultivation.content: Avoid ruining your harvest. This guide helps you navigate the steps of harvesting and curing cannabis properly.
